title: Fukushima Castle (Shinano Province)
text:
was a castle located on the <a href="Kiso%20river">Kiso river</a> in <a href="Kiso%2C%20Nagano%20%28town%29">Kiso, Nagano</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. 
History.
Fukushima Castle was the site of the <a href="Siege%20of%20Kiso-Fukushima">Siege of Kiso-Fukushima</a> led by <a href="Takeda%20Shingen">Takeda Shingen</a> in 1554. The castle's commander, surrendered the garrison when the food supplies ran out. The castle no longer stands.
